frontMatter.title: tiro::error
frontMatter.summary: Base class for all errors thrown by this library.

mdx.renderedOutput:
#tiro::error

Base class for all errors thrown by this library. #include "tiropp/error.hpp"

Inherits from exception

Inherited by api_error, bad_handle_cast, generic_error

#Public Functions

Name
virtual const char *message() const =0
A simple message line that describes the error condition. Never null.
virtual const char *details() const =0
Optional detailed error information. Never null, but may be empty.
